Constructor Detail

SourceFilter

public SourceFilter(boolean passMMS,
                    boolean passDSM,
                    boolean passNCS,
                    boolean passIS,
                    boolean passSC,
                    boolean passRTSTPS,
                    boolean not)
Filters on the source of an event.

Parameters:
passMMS - Whether or not events from the MMS should pass.
passDSM - Whether or not events from the DSM should pass.
passNCS - Whether or not events from the NCS should pass.
passIS - Whether or not events from the IS should pass.
passSC - Whether or not events from the SC should pass.
passRTSTPS - Whether or not events from the RT-STPS should pass.
not - If true, the filter passes if the source is NOT one of those specified.
